lead_paragraph: FISHER--Marjorie S. The Columbia School of Social Work mourns the passing of Marjorie S. Fisher. A philanthropic leader, she helped to establish the Fisher Cummings Washington Fellows Program, which prepares promising students for careers in public policy. We extend our sincere condolences to her daughter Julie and son-in-law Peter, and her entire family. Jeanette C. Takamura, Dean 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FISHER, MARJORIE S
